snippet: The police arrested a man who tried to attack a palace complex close to the prime minister’s office in Istanbul, throwing two homemade grenades that failed to detonate.
abstract: Turkish police arrest man who tried to use homemade grenades to attack Dolmabahce Palace near office of Prime Min Ahmet Davutoglu in Istanbul; police say man is suspected of belonging to terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested a man who tried to attack a palace complex close to the prime minister’s office in Istanbul, throwing two homemade grenades that failed to detonate.

headline.main: Turkish Police Thwart Attack on Prime Minister’s Office in Istanbul
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Police Arrest Armed Man After Attack Near the Premier’s Office
